articles.title: Revolution sign Cristiano Oliveira of Somerville as Homegrown Player
articles.description:
Oliveira, who was born in Cambridge and is a Somerville resident, is the 16th Homegrown Player in Revolution club history.

The post Revolution sign Cristiano Oliveira of Somerville as Homegrown Player appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Olympic fans get first chance to buy tickets to 2028 Games in Los Angeles
articles.description:
Starting Wednesday, prospective buyers can enter a lottery to get a chance to purchase the first tickets in April. Prices will start at $28.

The post Olympic fans get first chance to buy tickets to 2028 Games in Los Angeles appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Boston Legacy FC acquires Olympic gold medalist Nichelle Prince in trade with Kansas City Current
articles.description:
The Legacy will receive Prince and a 2026 international roster spot, and the Current will receive $125,000 in allocation funds and $50,000 in intraleague transfer funds in the deal.

The post Boston Legacy FC acquires Olympic gold medalist Nichelle Prince in trade with Kansas City Current appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: In a season of streaks, is Bruins’ latest heater worth believing in?
articles.description:
"I think it was one of the most complete games we played all year long."

The post In a season of streaks, is Bruins’ latest heater worth believing in? appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Swayman stops 24 shots for 1st shutout of season as Bruins beat Red Wings 3-0
articles.description:
Pavel Zacha, Fraser Minten and Mark Kastelic scored for the Bruins, who have won four straight and six of their last seven games.

articles.title: Report: Chargers fire offensive coordinator, OL coach after wild-card loss to Patriots
articles.description:
The Chargers scored 3 points against New England, the lowest total in the wild-card round.

articles.title: Bill Belichick breaks down what went right for the Patriots and wrong for the Chargers
articles.description:
The Chargers fell behind early and couldn't muster enough offense to match the Patriots.
